content:
CFS-D 1 Firestop putty disc Self-adhesive discs of firestop putty for single cables, conduits and bundles in openings up to 1 ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Firestop putties- - - ### FEATURES:Features Faster – putty discs can be installed in 10 seconds: peel, stick, done! Simpler – sealant-free and no backfill needed Versatile – fire barrier for virtually all applications involving low-voltage and mid-voltage cables, conduits (plastic and metal) and base materials (gypsum, concrete, masonry and wood) Suitable for sealing membrane or complete through-penetrations Acoustically tested according to ASTM E 90-09 Applications Pre-formed firestopping solution for single cables and small cable bundles in openings up to max. 1 For use on drywall, masonry, concrete and wood floor / ceiling assemblies Suitable for a broad range of low-voltage and mid-voltage cables Suitable for electrical metal tubing and rigid or flexible steel conduits Small pipe penetrations: PE, copper, steel and cast iron For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Approx. Density: 1.6 g/cm³ Color: Red Surface burning characteristics UL 723 (ASTM E84): Flame spread: 0Smoke development: 5 Technical Data | Approx. Density | 1.6 g/cm³ | Color | Red | Surface burning characteristics UL 723 (ASTM E84) | Flame spread: 0
Smoke development: 5 | LEED VOC | 5 g/l | Application temperature range | 32 - 104 °F | Storage and transportation temperature range | 23 - 104 °F | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2116245 - Firestop Cable Disc CFS-D 1 - Package Size 32 pc Package Contents: - 1x CFS-D 1/25 Firestop putty disc - 3549770 - 24 BOX COMBO CFS D1 PUTTY DIS - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 768x CFS-D 1/25 Firestop putty disc - 3549771 - 48 BOX COMBO CFS D1 PUTTY DIS - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1536x CFS-D 1/25 Firestop putty disc - 3549772 - 96 BOX COMBO CFS D1 PUTTY DIS - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 3072x CFS-D 1/25 Firestop putty disc
